name: Snowball's Quest
description:
Take the role of Snowball, a cat that lives inside of a digital world! Help her find the ingredients needed to bake a delicious cake for... someone special!

Buy the official soundtrack: https://fromthefourwinds.bandcamp.com/album/snowball-the-game-ost

Sprites, Programming and Game Design: ZanySon (@ZanySon_)

Music and Sound Design: Grid21 (@_Grid21)

Snowball based on the cat character from Kappamon: kappamon.com
